00011 public class InportsProcessor extends PortProcessor {
00012         
00013         public static Collection<? extends ProtoObject> doIt(
00014                         System aSystem, SystemLayouter layouter) {
00015         
00016                 InportsProcessor pp = new InportsProcessor();
00017                 pp.init(aSystem, layouter);
00018                 return pp.process( aSystem.getInports() );

00020 
00021         @Override
00022         public String getParentName(Port port) {
00023                 Inport inport = (Inport) port;
00024                 return inport.getParent().getSimulinkName();
00025         }

00027         @Override
00028         protected void addTypeSuffixIfNeeded(Port port) {
00029                 String name = port.getName(); 
00030                 if ( ! name.endsWith("In") ) {
00031                         port.setName( name + "_In" );
00032                 }               
00033         }
